title: As Above, So Below
description: A young university student lies paralyzed in a hospital bed, a victim of locked-in syndrome. As he struggles to come to terms with this horrific condition he discovers an astonishing ability, one that grants him special insights into the disturbing properties of a new and increasingly popular entheogen.You can download a FREE ebook version of As Above, So Below from:Apple Books; Barnes&Noble; Smashwords; Obooko.
author: Richard Lawther
